ai-patthana16.47:0.2_0: Having given the immaculateness of the Dhamma
ai-patthana16.47:0.3_0: for the sake of self-developing cloth for the sake of Saṁsāra
ai-patthana16.47:1.1_0: Not for the sake of non-existence, not for the sake of grasping.
ai-patthana16.47:1.1_1: Not for the sake of non-existence, not for the sake of grasping. ...
ai-patthana16.47:1.1_2: Such things don’t give rise to the have cause of impingement, or with no cause or condition.
ai-patthana16.47:2.1_0: Not for the sake of non-existence, not for the sake of grasping.
ai-patthana16.47:2.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
